scripts.install:all: concurrently "npm install --prefix angular-13-app" "npm install --prefix angular-18-app" "npm install --prefix angular-app" "npm install --prefix app-shell" "npm install --prefix react-app" "npm install --prefix vue-app"
scripts.start: concurrently "npm start --prefix angular-13-app" "npm start --prefix angular-18-app" "npm start --prefix angular-app" "npm start --prefix app-shell" "npm start --prefix react-app" "npm start --prefix vue-app"
